attributes.action: Decrease the national voting age to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The young people can have their say and choose the party with the polocies that affect them. There are many policies that are created for people in the 16 year gap, the party can strive to reach this age and  that 16 year old's can have a say and that democracy can be brought to more ages.
